data.title: Simple Steps to Cancel your PlayStation® Network Subscription in 2023
data.meta_description: Learn how to cancel your PlayStation network subscription in 2023 with our step-by-step guide. Avoid being charged, build credit, and save money today!
data.text:
PlayStation® Network has been a leading provider of high-quality gaming experiences to all gamers since 2006. It has now also extended its reach from just developing games compatible with consoles into providing a similar gaming experience for smartphones, tablets, and televisions too.

If you no longer plan on using your PlayStation Network subscription, you can easily cancel at any time before your next billing cycle begins.

Follow these simple steps to cancel your PlayStation Network subscription

To cancel on the official website:

Sign in to your PlayStation account.

Go to “Account Management”.

Select “Subscription”.

Click “Cancel Subscription” next to the subscription you want to cancel.

On PS5™:

Go to “Settings”. Select “Users and Accounts”.

Go to “Account” and choose “Payment and Subscriptions”. Click on “Subscriptions”.

Select the subscription you want to cancel and click “Cancel Subscription”.

To cancel a game or app service

Go to “Settings”. Select “Users and Accounts”.

Go to “Account” and choose “Payment and Subscriptions”. Click on “Game and App Services”.

Select the game or app service you want to cancel and click “Turn Off Auto-Renewal”.

On PS4™

PS Plus and EA Play

Go to “Settings”. Select “Account Management”.

Click on “Account Information” and choose “PlayStation Subscriptions”.

Select the subscription you want to cancel.

Select “Cancel Subscription”.

You can get all the information you need to cancel your subscription to PlayStation Network on this page. StellarFi can also help you build your credit score by paying all your PlayStation Network bills on time.

This is how PlayStation charges may appear in your bank statement

Why use StellarFi for all your billing needs?

One alternative to canceling your Playstation Network subscription is to automate your payments with StellarFi. With StellarFi, you no longer have to worry about remembering to pay your bills! Just link all of your regular payments to the StellarFi Virtual Bill Pay Card and see your credit score grow. Plus, you’ll get $5 in StellarFi credit for every friend you refer to StellarFi.
